words.defineEn: to apply solid waste from animals or plants to a piece of land in order to enhance the quality of its soil and help plants grow ever more quickly
words.defineVi: để bón chất thải rắn từ động vật hoặc thực vật vào một mảnh đất để nâng cao chất lượng đất và giúp cây trồng phát triển nhanh hơn

examples: My mom planted beautiful flowers in the front yard.
The child carefully planted caryopses of wildflowers in the garden.
He planted a gentle kiss on her cheek.
They have planted the seeds of their own destruction.
He planted arrowroot in his backyard garden.
words.defineEn: to put a seed, plant, etc. in the ground to grow
words.defineVi: để đặt một hạt giống, cây trồng, vv trong lòng đất để phát triển

examples: We just took pot luck.
A watched pot never boils.
We’ll have to take pot luck.
My mom cooked a delicious pot of rice to accompany our meal.
She brewed a pot of green tea and poured it over ice for a refreshing iced tea.
words.defineEn: to place a plant in a container, made of plastic or clay, filled with fertilized soil
words.defineVi: để đặt một cây trong một container, làm bằng nhựa hoặc đất sét, đầy đất đã được bón phân

examples: Lisa is as thin as a rake and she struggles to gain weight.
My teacher found out that I was skipping class and he raked me over the coals.
It has provided the disparate opposition an opportunity to come together and rake the government over the coals.
Let us not waste time raking over the coals when there is hard work to be done.
Despite his love for food, Peter remains thin as a rake due to his high metabolism.
words.defineEn: to make a ground surface become level or smooth, using a gardening tool called rake
words.defineVi: để làm cho bề mặt đất trở nên bằng phẳng hoặc bằng phẳng, sử dụng một dụng cụ làm vườn gọi là cào

examples: They are doing their neighbor a favor by mowing their lawn.
Peter had put off mowing the lawn for so long that the job seemed daunting, but after starting at one corner, he soon finished the whole yard.
You just mowed with a high speed camera fan dude.
In the shallows, the slug-like Kimberella lazily mowed down bacteria and algae.
Attempting to march in lines towards an enemy’s trench, soldiers of both sides were mowed down by machine gun fire.
words.defineEn: to cut grass, wheat, etc. with a gardening machine or handheld tools, such as scythe
words.defineVi: cắt cỏ, lúa mì, v.v. bằng máy làm vườn hoặc dụng cụ cầm tay, chẳng hạn như lưỡi hái

examples: And he's spreading mulch, a two-person job for which only one worker was available.
So mulches, but also living plants.

I take a lot of satisfaction in being able to go to my garden, lift a cold frame cover, you know, dig through some straw mulch, and pull up carrots or parsnips or beets or harvest a head of lettuce or spinach.

So if I have carrots in the garden in fall, or parsnips or beets, I will deep mulch them in late autumn before the ground freezes with straw or shredded leaves and then cover that with a row cover or an old bed sheet and that basically provides enough insulation that I can harvest all winter long.
So citric acid is mass-produced much like xanthan gum and carrageenan are, but instead of being pooped out by bacteria, or mulched out of seaweed, it's excreted by mold.
words.defineEn: to put a protective layer of decaying leaves or compost around a plant in order to improve the quality of its soil, as well as protecting its base and roots
words.defineVi: để đặt một lớp bảo vệ của lá mục nát hoặc phân hữu cơ xung quanh một nhà máy để cải thiện chất lượng của đất, cũng như bảo vệ cơ sở và rễ của nó

examples: This new snow shovel makes short work of clearing off the driveway.
This new snow shovel makes short work of clearing off the driveway.
Where is your shovel?
But your answer is shovel?
We might need that shovel.
words.defineEn: to use a rounded blade attached to a long handle, called shovel to dig or move earth
words.defineVi: sử dụng một lưỡi tròn gắn với một tay cầm dài, được gọi là xẻng để đào hoặc di chuyển trái đất

examples: He's sowing the seeds of his own downfall.
The Youtube comment sowed a seed of anger and untold frustrations which brought some questions to the forefront of her mind.
During his college years, John sowed his oats and enjoyed the freedom of casual relationships.
After all, you reap what you sow.
You accused me without having the right sow by the ear!
words.defineEn: to plant seeds in the earth or scatter them over the ground
words.defineVi: để trồng hạt giống trong trái đất hoặc phân tán chúng trên mặt đất

examples: She lived on borrowed time for years before finally receiving a heart transplant.
Transplant centers are a good revenue center for hospitals.
On the other hand your body could reject the transplant.
In 1971, for instance, biologists transplanted ten Italian wall lizards from one island off the coast of Croatia to another.
Specifically, a transplant from a person who is resistant to HIV.
words.defineEn: to remove a plant from its original place and replant it somewhere else
words.defineVi: để loại bỏ một nhà máy từ nơi ban đầu của nó và trồng lại nó ở một nơi khác

examples: Our waitress poured water for everyone at the table.
Water will always find its own level.
My mother waters the plants in our garden every morning.
Police turned water cannon on the rioters.
The water boiled away.
words.defineEn: to pour water on the ground to make plants grow in it
words.defineVi: đổ nước xuống đất để làm cho cây mọc trong đó

examples: She planted rutabaga seeds in her garden.
She blended pumpkin seeds into a creamy pesto sauce.
She carefully sprinkled sunflower seeds on top of her homemade bread dough.
He's sowing the seeds of his own downfall.
They have planted the seeds of their own destruction.
words.defineEn: to scatter seeds over an area of land with the intention of growing plants
words.defineVi: rải hạt giống trên một diện tích đất với mục đích trồng cây

words.defineEn: a long gardening tool used for trimming high branches or foliage, featuring a pruning saw or shears attached to the end of a pole for extended reach
words.defineVi: một công cụ làm vườn dài được sử dụng để cắt tỉa cành hoặc tán lá cao, có cưa hoặc kéo cắt tỉa được gắn vào đầu cột để mở rộng phạm vi

words.defineEn: a flat, rectangular blade with a sharp edge, used for cutting through roots, edging, and digging in hard or compacted soil
words.defineVi: một lưỡi dao phẳng, hình chữ nhật có cạnh sắc, được sử dụng để cắt rễ, viền và đào trong đất cứng hoặc đất nén chặt

words.defineEn: a rounded blade, used for digging and moving loose materials like soil, gravel, and sand
words.defineVi: một lưỡi kiếm tròn, được sử dụng để đào và di chuyển các vật liệu rời như đất, sỏi và cát
